flawed_nl_solution:
Jethro has 60/3 = $<<60/3=20>>20.
Twice of what Jethro has is $20 x 2 = $40
Carmen has $40 - 7 = $<<40-7=38>>38
The sum of all their money is $60 + $20 + $38 = $<<60+20+38=118>>118
#### 118

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
